Clues for each grid are not given in the order they should be entered. The label indicates the cultural origins of the demon reading down the center.
Letter strings preceding and following the letter in the name of the demon can be resorted to make new words, which are answered by the Exorcism Incantations.
One letter from each demon will fail to be exorcised -- it will become part of the new, rearranged word.
Pay attention to the letters in the demon that do not get exorcised.
